definition: to chatter or jabber on and on

sentences.english: That won't stop us from blathering on about it, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這並不能阻止我們在這個問題上喋喋不休。

sentences.english: I didn't understand the chatter, almost as much as they.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白這喋喋不休的扯談，他們也差不多如此。

sentences.english: Her endless talking is really bothering me.
sentences.chinese: 她講話喋喋不休真令我煩。

sentences.english: His wife kept on at him to buy her a new coat.
sentences.chinese: 他老婆喋喋不休地嘮叨要他爲她買一件新襖子。

sentences.english: The teacher harangued us all about our untidy work.
sentences.chinese: 老師對於凌亂的作業對我們全部喋喋不休地訓斥。

sentences.english: When I left he was still drivelling on about his popularity in school.
sentences.chinese: 當我離開時他還在喋喋不休地胡說他在學校的聲望。

sentences.english: Don't worry, we won't belabor this topic.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，我們不會就這個問題喋喋不休的。

sentences.english: I was victimized the whole evening by his constant chatter.
sentences.chinese: 整個晚上我都爲他的喋喋不休所擾。

sentences.english: He was hotted up by her constant chatter.
sentences.chinese: 她的喋喋不休令他煩躁不安。

sentences.english: In its default configuration, NAB is a real chatterbox.
sentences.chinese: 在默認設定下，NAB真是喋喋不休。

sentences.english: She clattered on and on about her children.
sentences.chinese: 她喋喋不休地談論她的兒女。

sentences.english: The young workers cackled their discontent with poor pay.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的工人們對低工資喋喋不休地表示不滿。
他們只是坐着喋喋不休。

sentences.english: That stupid television speaker is drivelling on again !
sentences.chinese: 那個愚蠢的電視又在喋喋不休地胡說了。

sentences.english: I know that his tongue wags.
sentences.chinese: 我知道他一說話就喋喋不休。

sentences.english: Seventhly, do not allow a prating swallow to possess your eaves.
sentences.chinese: 第七，不要讓喋喋不休的燕子佔據了你的屋檐。

definition: (onom.) chirping of insects, sighing noise etc
long-winded/garrulous/to talk endlessly without getting to the point
strange accent/odd manner of speaking or singing
to chatter or jabber on and on
long-winded/garrulous/to talk endlessly without getting to the point
to howl with laughter/to laugh one's head off
to chat with a low voice
